title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Gender Balance in Business
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Gender Balance in Business 

Survey) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (gender balance business survey) order 2025

title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act
heading: In this Order –
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order – 

“board of directors”, in relation to an undertaking, means the directing body of 
the undertaking; 

“senior executive team”, in relation to an undertaking, means the group of 
individuals responsible for the day-to-day management of the undertaking and 
accountable to the board of directors for such management; 

“survey” means the Gender Balance in Business Survey that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information specified 
in the Schedule.
text_norm: 2 order - board director relation undertaking mean directing body undertaking senior executive team relation undertaking mean group individual responsible day-to-day management undertaking accountable board director management survey mean gender balance business survey conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information specified schedule

title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that –
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that – 

(a) 

(b) 

employs 250 or more persons, and 

is classified for statistical purposes under section B, C, D, E, F, 
G, H, I, J, K, L, M, N, O, S or T of NACE Rev. 2.1 set out in 
Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20061, as amended 
by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 11 March 20082, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 
of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 
20123, Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 20 June 20194 and Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2023/137 of 10 October 20225. 

1 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
3 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
4 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 
5 OJ No. L 19, 20.1.2023, p. 5 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
once only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature of 
which is specified in the Schedule, is hereby prescribed. 

[95] 3 

 4 [95]

title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act
heading: Article 4

title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act
heading: 1. The number of individuals on the senior executive team in the
text_raw:
1. The number of individuals on the senior executive team in the 

undertaking concerned on 1 January 2025.
text_norm: 1 number individual senior executive team undertaking concerned 1 january 2025

title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to each individual on
text_raw:
2. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to each individual on 

the senior executive team: 

(a) 

name; 

(b) 

job title; 

(c) 

gender; 

(d) 

the number of years he or she has held the job title; 

(e) 

the number of years he or she has been employed by the 
undertaking.
text_norm: 2 information regarding following relates individual senior executive team (a) name (b) job title (c) gender (d) number year held job title (e) number year employed undertaking

title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act
heading: 3. The number of individuals on the board of directors of the undertaking
text_raw:
3. The number of individuals on the board of directors of the undertaking 

concerned on 1 January 2025.
text_norm: 3 number individual board director undertaking concerned 1 january 2025

title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to each individual on
text_norm: 4 information regarding following relates individual board director (a) name (b) gender (c) whether executive non-executive member board (d) number year held position board

title: in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking
text_raw:
5. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking 

concerned on 1 January 2025: 

(a) whether there are targets for the representation of individuals on 

the senior executive team who are of the female gender; 

(b) whether 

the achievement of 

in 
subparagraph (a) forms part of the performance review of the 
individuals on the senior executive team; 

targets referred 

the 

to 

(c) whether the targets referred to in subparagraph (a) apply by 
business function or are set for the enterprise as a whole within 
the undertaking. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6. 

Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to complete 
the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director General for the 
collection of the information referred to in paragraphs 1 to 5. 

[95] 5 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 27 March 2025 

MARY BUTLER, 
 Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [95]
